upcomingShows.description: An intimate evening of psychedelic americana under the stars.
Join us for a night of music and local brews in the heart of Sonoma County.
Our biggest show yet in the city by the bay.

pastShows.title: Sonoma Folk Festival 2024
pastShows.description: Where it all began - our first public performance together.

pastShows.title: Barn Sessions Live 2024
pastShows.description: An unforgettable night of music under the harvest moon.
